english.segment1: proverb 14:9 - and the evil bow befor. the good and the wicked at the gates of the rightousness
english.segment2: the evil bow, the evil bow oh Lord. here i stand and i see you. but where shall they be. the wicke run, the wicked run. we are now one with the son above. and what is it to you. what is the toll oh LORD. they shall pay with you
english.segment3: wicked run can't hide. testify in time in my bones. wicked run can't hide. in my bones. i receive and i believe. in my bone. rapture, rapture
english.segment4: the evil bow but we see you. but life within the three see. the wicked run the wicked run. we are now one with the son above. and what is it to you. what is the toll oh LORD. they shall pay with you
english.segment5: for it says deep within our fathers word. that one day the evil shall bow before the good. and the wicked at the gates of the rightousness. so my question is. where shall you be
